shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the first remote video frame is rendered.

p.codeblock: virtual void onFirstRemoteVideoFrame(uid_t uid, int width, int height, int elapsed) { (void)uid; (void)width; (void)height; (void)elapsed; }
on(evt: EngineEvents.FIRST_REMOTE_VIDEO_FRAME, cb: ( uid: number, width: number, height: number, elapsed: number) => void ): this;

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the first local video frame is displayed/rendered on the local video view. The application can retrieve the time elapsed (the elapsed parameter) from a user joining the channel until the first video frame is displayed.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user sending the video stream.
The width (px) of the video stream.
The height (px) of the video stream.
Time elapsed(ms) from the local user calling until the SDK triggers this callback.
